name: Scrub Daddy Flex Texture Cleaning Sponge, Original Yellow 4 1/8 inches
reviews: Does a good job but still gentle enough not to scratch things. Dries fast and cleans out easily.

name: Scrub Daddy Flex Texture Cleaning Sponge, Original Yellow 4 1/8 inches
reviews: I bought 2 of the original versions, and think it was enough.The texture of this scrub is very elastic. However, it does not become as hardened as compared to the first time use, still very good so far.I use it to clean almost everything, my bathroom, bbq stove..... and it works very well. After get everything cleaned, scrub daddy itself is very easy to clean and comeback to original color.

name: Scrub Daddy Flex Texture Cleaning Sponge, Original Yellow 4 1/8 inches
reviews: This is the best sponge ever made! It is so versatile and easy to use. The material makes it easy to clean! I’ve personally tested it on a new regular sponge and the scrub daddy got everything off the dish in 2 swipes (the sponge took 9 and there was still some left over). You can also use the mouth to clean spoons which is a little bit of a gimmick but it still works incredibly well. My favourite feature is cleaning cups with the scrub daddy. Just stick your fingers in the eyes and twist it in a cup. It’s as good as new! I love this sponge and i’m definitely buying more!

name: Scrub Daddy Flex Texture Cleaning Sponge, Original Yellow 4 1/8 inches
reviews: Love love love. Highly recommend.

name: Scrub Daddy Flex Texture Cleaning Sponge, Original Yellow 4 1/8 inches
reviews: I can never go back to ordinary dish/cleaning sponges/scrubs.  This is value for money for the quality you get.  It's long lasting and does what it promises to do.  Multi-purpose so you dollars stretches further.n Great buy.

name: Scrub Daddy Flex Texture Cleaning Sponge, Original Yellow 4 1/8 inches

name: Scrub Daddy Flex Texture Cleaning Sponge, Original Yellow 4 1/8 inches
reviews:
Works well for pots and pans, but can't say it's a game changer in the oven, which I what I purchased it for. I bought it after watching the promo, my children saw it on TV... I prefer the heavy duty Vileda Power Scrub Scourer, especially for the oven. It's cute, but limited.

name: Scrub Daddy Flex Texture Cleaning Sponge, Original Yellow 4 1/8 inches
reviews:
Heard all the rage about this. Was hesitant. But lasts much longer than a kitchen sponge and foams well.

name: Scrub Daddy Flex Texture Cleaning Sponge, Original Yellow 4 1/8 inches
reviews:
I hate kitchen sponges. Really I do. Germ factories. But not this one. Once a week (or more often as needed) I chuck it in the dishwasher et voila!  Clean and sanitised. The open grain of the sponge makes it easy to get clean in a diswasher, and assists in scrubbing what it needs to. Love it
  
Read more

name: Scrub Daddy Flex Texture Cleaning Sponge, Original Yellow 4 1/8 inches
reviews:
I have the applicator so it just hangs in my sink.  The smiley face is cute, and I like the overall aesthetics of it - something as simple as a smiley face to brighten your mood.  Does a great job too and is easy to clean. Sterilse it with hot water from the jug and then it just hangs to dry.  Love it
